dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5924 IH: Lower Drug Costs Today Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Magaziner introduced the following bill

Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act with respect to the timing of changes to the annual out-of-pocket threshold for the Medicare prescription drug benefit, and to amend title XI of such Act with respect to the timing of the Medicare drug price negotiation program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Lower Drug Costs Today Act.

section.header: Timing of changes to annual out-of-pocket threshold for Medicare prescription drug benefit

subsection.text: Section 1860D–2(b)(4)(B)(i) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1395w–102(b)(4)(B)(i)) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subclause (VI), by striking 2024 and inserting 2023; and
in subclause (VII), by striking 2025 and inserting 2024.
Section 1860D–2 of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1395w–102) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in subsection (a)(2)(A)(i)(I), by striking 2025 and inserting 2024;

clause.text: in paragraph (2)—

subclause.text: in subparagraph (A), by striking 2025 each place it appears and inserting 2024;

item.text: in clause (i), by striking 2025 and inserting 2024; and
in clause (ii)(III), by striking 2024 and inserting 2023;

subitem.text: in the matter preceding subclause (I), by striking 2025 and inserting 2024; and
in subclause (I)(bb), by striking 2024 and inserting 2023; and

item.text: in clause (ii)(V), by striking 2024 and inserting 2023; and

subclause.text: in subparagraph (E)(i), by striking 2025 and inserting 2024;

clause.text: in paragraph (3)(A)—

subclause.text: in the matter preceding clause (i), by striking 2025 and inserting 2024; and
in clause (ii), by striking 2024 and inserting 2023; and

clause.text: in paragraph (4)—

item.text: in clause (i), by striking 2025 and inserting 2024; and
in clause (iii)(II), by striking 2025 and inserting 2024; and

subclause.text: in subparagraph (E), by striking 2024 and inserting 2023;

clause.text: in the matter preceding clause (i), by striking 2025 each place it appears and inserting 2024; and
in clause (i), by striking 2025 each place it appears and inserting 2024; and

subparagraph.text: in subsection (d)(1)(A), by striking 2025 and inserting 2024.

paragraph.text: Section 1860D–4(a)(4)(B)(i) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1395w–104(a)(4)(B)(i)) is amended by striking 2025 and inserting 2024.
Section 1860D–14(a)(1)(C) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1395w–114(a)(1)(C)) is amended by striking 2025 and inserting 2024.
Section 1860D–15(b) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1395w–115(b)) is amended—

clause.text: in subparagraph (A), by striking 2025 and inserting 2024; and
in subparagraph (B), in the matter preceding clause (i), by striking 2025 and inserting 2024; and

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (3), by striking 2025 and inserting 2024.

paragraph.text: Section 1860D–22(a)(2)(A) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1395w–132(a)(2)(A)) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in clause (i), by striking 2025 and inserting 2024; and
in clause (ii), by striking 2025 and inserting 2024.

paragraph.text: Section 1860D–41(a)(6) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1395w–151(a)(6)) is amended by striking 2025 and inserting 2024.

section.header: Timing of Medicare drug price negotiation program

subsection.text: Part E of title XI of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1320f et seq.) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in subsection (b)(1), by striking 2026 and inserting 2024; and

clause.text: in the subsection heading, by striking 2026 and inserting 2024; and
in the matter preceding paragraph (1), by striking 2026 and inserting 2024;
in paragraph (1), by striking 2026 and inserting 2024;
in paragraph (2), by striking 2027 and inserting 2025;
in paragraph (3), by striking 2028 and inserting 2026; and
in paragraph (4), by striking 2029 and inserting 2027;
in the paragraph heading, by striking 2026 and 2027 and inserting 2024 and 2025;
by striking 2026 and inserting 2024; and
by striking 2027 and inserting 2025;
in paragraph (1), by striking 2026 or 2027 and inserting 2024 or 2025;
in paragraph (2)(A), by striking 2026, 2027, and 2028 and inserting 2024, 2025, and 2026; and
in paragraph (3)(A)(ii), by striking 2026, 2027, and 2028 and inserting 2024, 2025, and 2026; and
in clause (i), by striking 2026 and inserting 2024; and
in clause (ii), by striking 2027 and inserting 2025; and
in clause (i)—

subclause.text: in the clause heading, by striking 2026 and inserting 2024; and

clause.text: in clause (ii)—

subclause.text: in the clause heading, by striking 2027 and inserting 2025; and
in the matter preceding subclause (I), by striking 2027 and inserting 2025;

subparagraph.text: in subsection (d), by striking 2029 or 2030 and inserting 2027 or 2028; and
in subsection (f)(3), by striking 2028 and inserting 2026.

subsection.text: Section 1860D–4(b)(3)(I)(i) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1395w–104(b)(3)(I)(i)) is amended by striking 2026 and inserting 2024.
